alert.note: Alert for Isle of Wight; James City; Newport News; Surry (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued October 16 at 2:24PM EDT until October 16 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Surry, James City, Isle of Wight and Newport News Counties. * WHEN...Until 4 PM EDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Shallow flooding is possible in the most vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. JAMES RIVER AT SCOTLAND/JAMESTOWN VA MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 4.0 FT, MODERATE 4.5 FT, MAJOR 5.0 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.8 FT, MODERATE 2.3 FT, MAJOR 2.8 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 16/01 PM 3.9 1.7 1.5 1 NONE 17/02 AM 3.2 1.0 1.3 1 NONE 17/02 PM 3.7 1.5 1.2 1 NONE 18/02 AM 3.0 0.8 1.2 1 NONE 18/03 PM 3.5 1.3 1.0 1 NONE 19/03 AM 2.8 0.6 1.0 1 NONE SEWELLS POINT VA MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 4.5 FT, MODERATE 5.5 FT, MAJOR 6.5 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.7 FT, MODERATE 2.7 FT, MAJOR 3.7 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 16/10 AM 4.4 1.6 1.4 2 NONE 16/11 PM 3.6 0.8 1.1 2 NONE 17/11 AM 4.1 1.3 1.0 1-2 NONE 18/12 AM 3.4 0.6 0.9 1 NONE 18/12 PM 3.7 0.9 0.7 1 NONE 19/12 AM 3.0 0.2 0.6 1 NONE FORT MONROE VA MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 4.5 FT, MODERATE 5.5 FT, MAJOR 6.0 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.7 FT, MODERATE 2.7 FT, MAJOR 3.2 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 16/10 AM 4.4 1.6 1.4 2 NONE 16/11 PM 3.7 0.9 1.1 1-2 NONE 17/11 AM 4.1 1.3 1.0 1-2 NONE 18/12 AM 3.4 0.6 0.9 1 NONE 18/12 PM 3.8 1.0 0.7 1 NONE 19/12 AM 3.0 0.2 0.6 1 NONE &&
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.
